effect.diamond-pearl: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.
effect.platinum: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: Boulders are hurled at the foe. It also lowers the foe’s Speed by preventing its movement.
